description.lang: The ABUS Z-Wave Gateway is a compact smart home control unit in Family Home Design using the Z-Wave radio standard. It can control up to 120 Z-Wave Radio components and is also compatible to the ABUS Smartvest Wireless Alarm System. The System can be controlled from any location via the free App ABUS Z-Wave ONE (for IOS and Android) that allows to configure up to 60 scenes (if - then - when).
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, report Device Reset Locally when reset
